SEARCH
Package com.tamu.sugarfreechicken.backend

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
com.tamu.sugarfreechicken.backend.DatabaseManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
CheckoutManager, EmployeeManager, LoginManager, ProductUsageManager, SalesReportManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
A base class for all backend scripts to pull database information from. Provides some basic query methods.
Author:
Ryan O'Mullan

      ArrayList of Employee objects for all employees in the database

    • queryEmployees

      protected ArrayList<Employee> queryEmployees(String conditional)
      Queries the database for all employees satisfying a given SQL conditional
      Parameters:
      conditional - SQL conditional string to filter employees by
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Employee objects for all satisying employees in the database
